summary: Skyrim Atlas is a mod based on the plugin 'Atlas' for the MMORPG 'World of Warcraft' As I always thought it was a handy plugin to get information on almost everything and Skyrim didn't have any mods that added something like it i made Skyrim Atlas.
descriptionHtml:
Description
Skyrim Atlas is a mod based on the plugin 'Atlas' for the MMORPG 'World of Warcraft' As I always thought it was a handy plugin to get information on almost everything and Skyrim didn't have any mods that added something like it so i made Skyrim Atlas.
What it basically does is provide info on resources, NPCs, Etc...Â  (Ore at the moment)

Screenshots : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/219040/?
author: Mitsarugi and Willy4x4
